definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The Corpus Juris was the product of a careful process of selection and rejection.
sentences.chinese: 《國法大全》是一部經過精心篩選的作品。

sentences.english: Do British laws conflict with any international laws?
sentences.chinese: 英國法與國際法是否有相違背之處？

sentences.english: Provisions governed by foreign laws as selected by the parties concerned shall be void.
sentences.chinese: 當事人選擇適用外國法的條款無效。

sentences.english: Everyone disgraced abroad, but also to be tolerated by the law of the land.
sentences.chinese: 丟人丟到國外，自然也爲國法所不容。

sentences.english: I had ever consciously entertained the idea of violating the laws of the land.
sentences.chinese: 我有意識地產生了違犯國法的想法。

sentences.english: Could you change these French francs for me?
sentences.chinese: 能給我兌換這些法國法郎嗎？

sentences.english: The first national law came in 1848 during the Mexican War.
sentences.chinese: 第一個國法出現於1848年的墨西哥戰爭時。

sentences.english: Then it is the analysis of the system of Interlocutory Injunction in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 接着分析了英國法上中間禁令的適用條件。

sentences.english: Currency name for the French franc.
American courts and universities are at each other's throats, and once again the issue is race.
sentences.chinese: 美國法院和大學一直鬧不休，這次又是種族問題。

sentences.english: Britain argued its law didn't fall within the scope of the EU rules.
sentences.chinese: 英國高院迴應，英國法不屬於歐盟法的範圍。

sentences.english: Itwouls 200 French francs at todaywouls selling rate.
sentences.chinese: 此日的賣出價是200法國法郎。

sentences.english: The defendants argued that it was not possible in English law to make an offer to the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 在英國法中不可能對全世界發出要約。

sentences.english: Give me200 dollar worth of french francs .
sentences.chinese: 請給我200美元的法國法郎。

sentences.english: In English law, insurance contract is a contract of utmost good faith.
sentences.chinese: 英國法將保險合同定性爲最大誠信合同。

sentences.english: I would like to exchange New Tai Wan dollars to French Francs.
sentences.chinese: 我想把新臺幣換成法國法郎。

definition: bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
to take turns/to work by roster
